content: As a proof of concept, the eHealth Exchange is looking for EHRs (providers) to use a SMART on FHIR app to query a PDMP system in a non-production environment. Some assistance can be provided to get the SMART on FHIR app hooked into your EHR system. We are looking at completing this proof of concept in the next 3 weeks. Please let me know if you're interested.
